name: Banana Egg Waffles
author: UpsonFam5
summary: Our family makes these waffles for a gluten-free breakfast that tastes great, too! These waffles taste delicious with fruit inside them, too! Try substituting blueberries for chocolate chips; they're still delicious! Spread some butter, then add a dollop of maple syrup, and the kids will never know these aren't the regular pancakes you make every Saturday morning!
directions: Preheat a waffle iron according to manufacturer's instructions and prepare surfaces with cooking spray
Whisk eggs, bananas, and vanilla extract together in a large bowl until smooth
Stir peanut butter into the egg mixture until smooth
Fold oats and chocolate chips through the egg mixture
Cook batter on waffle iron according to manufacturer's instructions until golden brown, about 3 minutes
